name: simplesamlphp/simplesamlphp
description: A PHP implementation of a SAML 2.0 service provider and identity provider, also compatible with Shibboleth 1.3 and 2.0.

suggest.predis/predis: Needed if a Redis server is used to store session information
suggest.ext-curl: Needed in order to check for updates automatically
suggest.ext-ldap: Needed if an LDAP backend is used
suggest.ext-radius: Needed if a Radius backend is used
suggest.ext-memcache: Needed if a Memcache server is used to store session information
suggest.ext-pdo: Needed if a database backend is used, either for authentication or to store session information
suggest.ext-mysql: Needed if a MySQL backend is used, either for authentication or to store session information
suggest.ext-pgsql: Needed if a PostgreSQL backend is used, either for authentication or to store session information
